name: Car Pong html5
description:
It's the traditional Pong game that we all know, but now with Cars.

The rule is as simple as it comes:

  • You are on the left
  • Car will move to your mouse
  • Block the ball from getting over to your sidewalk
  • Score 3 to win

Everything is still in development so bugs may pop up here and there. Contact me if anything comes up.
